bmnw.ponder.tag.early_game.description: Machines used in the early game phase
bmnw.ponder.early_game/stamping_press.te: A stamp is required for the stamping press to function
Additionally, any furnace fuel is required
It can now convert metal ingots into plates and wires
Keep the durability of your stamps in mind!
bmnw.ponder.early_game/alloy_blast_furna: The alloy blast furnace is used to create various metal alloys
Additionally, any furnace fuel is required
The furnace can be automated with hoppers
bmnw.ponder.tag.explosives.description: Various extreme explosives for death and destruction
bmnw.ponder.explosives/little_boy.text_1:
The Little Boy has a blast radius of 128
But it cannot simply be detonated directly after placing it!
bmnw.ponder.explosives/little_boy.text_2: It will require 6 components to be added before it can be detonated
bmnw.ponder.explosives/little_boy.text_3: Open up the nuke GUI by right clicking it with a Screwdriver
bmnw.ponder.explosives/little_boy.text_1: The nuke is now ready for detonation!
Remember to keep a safe distance.
bmnw.ponder.explosives/caseoh.text_1:
The Fat Man has a blast radius of 256
But it cannot simply be detonated directly after placing it!
bmnw.ponder.explosives/caseoh.text_2: It will require 6 components to be added before it can be detonated
bmnw.ponder.explosives/caseoh.text_3: Open up the nuke GUI by right clicking it with a Screwdriver
bmnw.ponder.explosives/caseoh.text_7: The nuke is now ready for detonation!
bmnw.ponder.explosives/caseoh.text_8: Remember to keep a safe distance.
